name: Fillit
description:
Filit is a frantic 1 to 4 player casual action game based and inspired by the nostalgic Xonix and Volfied games adding a unique mechanics and new gameplay.
Grab your areas while avoiding your enemies and bad bosses.

Single player

  • Over 100 single player levels
  • Classic game mode in stunning HD
  • Fight 30 unique bosses




Play together

  • Play together and win over 100 levels
  • Local Co-Op for two players
  • Solve challenging situations and overcome boss levels




Play against friends

  • Up to 4 players
  • Try to beat your friends
  • 6 different arenas
  • Use your special powers and abilities
